definition: silver ingot
silver/silver-colored/relating to money or currency
(weaving) spindle/ingot/pressed cake of medicine etc/classifier for: gold and silver ingots, ink sticks

sentences.english: The appearance of Jiaozi looks like the V-shape(some say half-moon shaped)gold or silver ingot used as money in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 饺子是半月型，型同古代的钱币银锭和金锭。

sentences.english: When you drop a silver bar on your toe, it hurts.
sentences.chinese: 你把银锭掉在脚上，会感到痛。
